website_summaries.verdict: A two-in-one steam mop and handheld steamer by one of the most popular brands in floor cleaning products.
pros: A powerful steam mop and a handheld steamer in one, as the canister lifts away for steaming multiple surfaces
Mop head flips, doubling the amount of cleaning possible before the reusable pad needs washing
cons: Some reports of the steaming mechanism malfunctioning after several months of use
Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum

customer_reviews.title: This has proved to be a very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is used on my parquet, stone tile and engineered-wood flooring and makes a dull task almost enjoyable! I did the research and this model and manufacturer came out ahead: I do not regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: Tried the £60 Karcher all-in-one which was useless. This is in a different league
customer_reviews.text: Cost more than other steam mop or equivalent. But you are paying for quality. We had a cheap-ish Vax before, which broke after a few years. Tried the £60 Karcher all-in-one which was useless. This is in a different league.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Kwa

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful!
customer_reviews.text: This machine was much heavier than expected and was very difficult to move around ( the pad was wet). There was no difference in the amount of steam produced, despite what setting had been chosen, and the extra spurt of steam was a waste of time. Also it was impossible to clean parts of the floor because the big floor pad couldn’t get close enough. On the plus side, it was easy to assemble and the pads could be removed/ fitted extremely easily. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Galli

customer_reviews.title: Full steam ahead
customer_reviews.text: This mop was bought as a replacement for an existing mop which was a different make and had given up the ghost. It was very easy to set up and use and the quick change head is a useful feature.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: a toy
customer_reviews.text: this is the most poor product I seen for long time it is hard to use and it wash very dry some steam going it take time wash normal floor or wooden floor is night mare i nice it -3rating
customer_reviews.author: e.p

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: It was good but stopped working after a few months and nott able to get it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer I've had.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third steamer and the best yet. Easy to use, tank large enough to do lounge, dining room and kitchen. Plenty of flex. Lots of steam at all times. Mop head really cleans and goes further under furniture than any other I've used. Flipping the mop head half way through.....genius. Really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CornishElephants

customer_reviews.title: Superb steam mop
customer_reviews.text: Having bought many steam mops over the years and finding myself continually disappointed I stumbled upon this one. I’ve owned it nearly a year now and it’s been used regularly. The folding head principal is superb, so easy to use, large sensible shaped pads, which are still close to new condition, are a blessed relief after endless rubbish from generic vax type products. The mop head mechanism works perfectly after nearly a year, reassuringly well made. I can’t recommend this mop enough, it cleans thoroughly, it works perfectly, and one year on continues to perform like the first day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for a month now. Doesn't produce as much steam or heat as prior model, and it won't stand up by itself. The pad is large, which is good generally, but not for getting into corners / small places. To empty, you have to turn the whole thing upside-down. Yes its light-weight, but surely a detachable container, like other models, is simpler? Floor is still clean, but don't feel the higher price is validated
customer_reviews.author: Richard Highfield

customer_reviews.title: Much better than others I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than others I've used (such as a Black and Decker, which recently stopped producing steam). We have a rough slate floor and the pad on this steam mop actually stays on during use. It's reversible, which is great, and is attached and detached easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get chance to turn on
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to turn it on. The handle slotted in, but wouldn't lock. Called customer service, who were helpful, but sent me the wrong type of handle. Couldn't break deadlock, so sent mop back for refund. Bit worrying that Shark can't correctly procure parts.
customer_reviews.author: K-Man

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at All Costs ! Has been replaced twice and now broken again
customer_reviews.text: Shark and interesting name indeed. Perhaps i could add an S to the end as these Sharks are selling for top dollar a product that clearly has a design fault! I'm on my soon to be third replacement. in under a year. That's if I can get through to a customer support team who are as hard to get through to as a teenager who smokes. I would avoid this product like you would the creepy drunken bloke from accounts at a Christmas Party.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Acid

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on laminate floor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mop my laminate floor thinking it would be easier but it's made my floor bubble, don't buy it if you have laminate floor I've only just put my floor down too and I now have to replace it I'm not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great powered steam mop
customer_reviews.text: Great for my engineered Oak floor. I had a Holme steam mop before so thought my floor was fairly clean. I thought I would only be using one of the mop heads but check my photo. I certainly needed both and was unbelievable how much dirt came off. Very impressed - I used the high steam level and was great.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant steam mop
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant. I had another steam mop before which I felt wasn’t up to scratch so bought this to replace it. So easy to put together and use. I couldn’t believe how well it cleaned my kitchen floor which I thought wasn’t that dirty. I’ve also cleaned my laminate flooring on the lowest setting and it performed really well with this too. I’d definitely recommend Shark and would look at their other products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review having had this mop for a while but only using it a handful of times due to also having an alternative product. It has been used less than 10 times in just over a year and developed what turned out to be a terminal issue. The product only has a warranty of 12 months so the only option would be to replace it. Given that this is the second one I have had (the first one also developed a problem and was replaced under warranty after about 7 months) I would not recommend buying this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kaulpage

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and awkward to steer
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a refund off amazon for this as the courier left it on my front door and someone took it! They were very good in dealing with this as always so can’t fault amazon in that respect. Purchased elsewhere as needed same day. Very disappointed so I took it back. Heavy to use and awkward to steer, definitely not worth the money! An ecloth with a bottle of spray does the job far better and easier! Mop falls down as no standing option.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very easy too use, great product.
customer_reviews.text: shark is a great brand, and this mop is great and easy to use. My floors get super clean the dry time is fast and I don’t have to use a bucket anymore. The head cloth is easy to assemble and when you finish just toss it in the washing machine. I use to have the Vauxhall’s and the political vaporetto mop both where bulkier and left my floors wet. This is the best steam mop I have use.
customer_reviews.author: MRS G VILLARREAL

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review a product, at least, not until I've had a chance to use it and really put it to the test. I am a reluctant cleaner of my house, but like it to look good at little effort. I ADORE this steam mop, my first ever! I copied my son and daughter-in-law by buying it because they recommended it. It doesn't disappoint. I really can see the difference and I've now forgotten that I ever used a bucket and mop. Well done Shark - I finally don't mind mopping floors!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy vW

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received my steam mop I was putting it together and using it within 10 minutes... I could not believe how much dirt I picked up with it. I used a spray bottle with zoflira to get that freshness... I also ordered 4 extra mops probably didn't need to do this as 2 come with it... overall very happy with it and it certainly makes my life a lot easier now which can only be a bonus when you work full time have 2 lazy untidy cats and a lazy fiancee
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This mop is brilliant. I thought my tiled floor was clean until I used this. I used to have a vax mop which is now at the local tip. The shark is 100 times better and my floor looks like new. It's easy to assemble and once you put water in and switch it on its ready to go in seconds. You get 3 steam levels and a quick flip of the head gives access to a steam blast jet. This really does a very good job and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for 2 Months then breaks
customer_reviews.text: Our second one has just broken again after 2 Months. Will return once again to Amazon for a refund. Will try the Vax next.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurus

customer_reviews.title: constant and hot steam, shame it does not stand up
customer_reviews.text: Overall it does a decent job of cleaning my tiled floor, but disappointed that it doesn't free stand, so you must constantly lean it against something! please add this feature in the next design, my old unit could stand up by itself!
customer_reviews.author: Milka

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat aShark
customer_reviews.text: Had a Shark steam mop few years ago, best steam mop on the market. Replaced it with two other throughout the years, they were awful. This is Quality well worth paying the difference, Plug in and go 30 secs fill with water of course. Easy to use, cleans floors without mess and pools of water, dry in a couple minutes, No Streaks, 3 settings, Long lead.
customer_reviews.author: Eye

customer_reviews.title: Can or recommend highly enough
customer_reviews.text: This is the bees knees. It heats up quick, cleans well and dries quick. The cord is extremely long and adequate. The quick release of the pads is easy to use and the handle has a nice grip. This is a well thought out product. I bought spare pads as my floor gets dirty with dogs but you get two with it. They have a two day use as you can ‘turn’ the pad to the clean side for the next time. Stores away nicely. I use ironised water in mine as we live in an extremely hard water area even with a water softener I wanted to protect the product. 10/10

customer_reviews.title: WD25 Watford

customer_reviews.title: Good machine

The pads are washable and can be turned around when the one part is dirty. There is also a spray facility, for extra loosening of dirt, when you flip the pad over. I would recommend this steamer. The hand-held part enables steaming curtains and soft furnishings.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. J. Ashton

customer_reviews.title: No more wet slippy floors. Just clean quick-drying ones
customer_reviews.text: We love it. The kids love Using it. It’s easy and fun to use. Love that you don’t have to touch the pads. Love the extra boost function. Love you can flip the pad over without touching it to use the other side. Love that I can use it on my wooden floor. Best thing? It dries in around three minutes so no more slippery wet floors or dirty kids footprints on my clean floors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: andsotobed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic, it’s made such a difference to my wood floors! I’m not great with mobility and have 2 kittens who love spreading mess around. I’ve had the flat cleaned professionally twice in the lead up to using this steam cleaner and the results from this were far better
customer_reviews.author: SARAH SMITH

customer_reviews.title: An excellent steam cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a different make which has given up the ghost so to speak. This new one is much more solid than the old one and has some excellent features, such as the handsfree method of changing the microfibre cleaning pad. I must say I am not the user of the machine, rather that is the other half's domain. customer_reviews.author: mjcairney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item
customer_reviews.text: Having had two Vax steam mops, both of which broke, I decided to look at other brands and so glad I did. The Shark is well made, excellent cleaning and has 3 settings. Comes with excellent quality spare mop. Very happy cleaner now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very good product

customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Very good stream mop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to clean the hard flooring. The assembly was a bit pain as the handle couldn’t go in but eventually got there. It’s easy to use and strong enough to remove stains on the floor. The clean mops would get dirty very soon so I ended up to get another pack of 2 mops. In summary, it’s very capable of cleaning hard floor in kitchen, hallway, toilet especially you have a little one who makes mess whilst eating.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works efficiently and leaves lovely clean floor. Only criticism is awkward to stand up. Need to hang up off floor. Would still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fiona

customer_reviews.title: This product is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My only dislikes are there is not a switch off button on the equipment itself, you have to switch it off from the mains, which is a bit annoying if you want to stop and move an item within the room. It feels a bit heavy to push while cleaning. However, with that been said it is a great product, worth the money paid, the steam is very powerful especially when used on tiled areas ie Kitchen and bathroom and it cleans really well. I would definitely recommend this product once you can get pass the not been able to switch it off from the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture

customer_reviews.title: Great steam mop, definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this steam mop, previously owned a Karcher but only used it once as I wasn’t happy with it, this is so easy to use, and I use it as often as I can. So lightweight and easy to manoeuvre. Only down side is it doesn’t hold itself up, needs to be propped against something so it’s fallen over a few times 😑
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Louise

customer_reviews.title: Love this steam mop!!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a replacement due to a fault but that didnt stop me wanting another one as it is such a great mop. The flip function is great and saves time. We got it on black friday originally and it was on offer for just over half price so may be an idea to wait for those sorts of deal as its quite a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: DaZzo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought broke after 6 months and stopped producing steam, It was replaced and now the replacement has stopped working after 6 months for the same reason Can no longer get a replacement as the warranty runs from the initial purchase very disappointed. Previous shark products have been really good. And we have a water softener so its not a hard water issue.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Deceiptful - fails to provide essential accessory as found in Owners manual page 6
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a useful machine for floors but we did not get the garment steamer, bonnet and bristle brush so cannot steam clothes or freshen upholstery like the advert says. The manual also identifies these attachments as "certain models only" but does not guide you to which model/s. The manual also says to check the box's top panel for "full list of what is included" - we did and there is nothing there. Is Amazon short changing people or are Shark?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stone

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on wooden floors and floor tiles
customer_reviews.text: I really like my steamer, great for wooden floors, what a difference after. Remember to lean down on handle to get a bit more steam. I’m definitely a fan. I haven’t used the attachments for wall tiles and other surfaces yet but seeing what it does to floors I fully expect it to work a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Lissyagnesjane

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Steaming properly after about 8 months

When we turn it on it steams as normal therefore there is no blockage....however after a couple of minutes it stops steaming altogether so its useless. If we turn it off for few minutes and turn on it will start steaming again but same thing happens few minutes later where it does not steam anymore
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Yore

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning a pleasure!
customer_reviews.text: I have just got this and I have to say, it is the first time I have ever enjoyed cleaning. I also like the hand held cleaner which is a joy to use and makes everything feel like it has been sterilised. You still need to give it a quick wipe afterwards but it just feels so much cleaner and also it is quite fun. I put essential oils on the bottom of the mop pad and my house smells wonderful. I am impressed so far, I just hope it stands the test of time...

customer_reviews.title: disapointed not complete.

customer_reviews.title: Superb

I note the critic of it not standing up on its on, to be honest, it's no different to a inferior floor steamers I have had in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I expected

customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Shark, do do do do
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous! Such a great piece of kit, love how the cable is really long so you can do a whole room without having to find a new socket. Not that I’d know, the cleaner uses it. That was a joke! I use it everyday and love it. Can’t help singing baby shark as I do, kids hate me for it.
customer_reviews.author: Abeygale Burne

customer_reviews.title: Great design, effective cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget. The fact you can turn the pad round once the first half is dirty means you can easily do the whole kitchen in one go and often a bathroom etc too. The flip for extra steam is easy and effective. I find it quite an effort to move the cleaner around especially if there are stubborn stains that need more friction, but it does work really well.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant steam mop

I had heard good reviews on this steam mop and as it does not use any chemicals I bought it. I would 100% recommend it, so easy to use and leave my tiles and floors spotless. Perfect results so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Was really pleased with the product, used fairly frequently, unfortunately has decided to stop working... So has worked out expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Steam not working; poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought tholis product thinking the higher price makes it more credibly effective. customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great steam Mop and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had chance to use this a few times before writing a review. Easy assembly Heats up good, I only use setting one as it’s for wooden floors. The steam jet is very handy for stubborn marks. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: mike melton

customer_reviews.title: Good Steam mop
customer_reviews.text: I like this steam mop, it's powerful on the floors. My only Gripe is it doesn't stand up on it's on so It doesn't click into place so falls over. It's not light weight but its great to use and the extra spurt of steam is handy on stubborn marks. Also easy to get replacement mop heads, Easy to change mop heads.

customer_reviews.text: Great steamer but had this item for 2 months and its stopped working...
customer_reviews.author: Emma-Louise Rygalska

customer_reviews.text: Its a shark so bound to be good!Not disappointed at all...easy fill, heats in less than a minute and i clean kitchen and hall (tiled) no wetness left, just a clean no streaks floor!

customer_reviews.author: Aishah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to go into great lengths...... if you have bought a steam mop before ( which I guess most people have if they are looking at this one!).... the Shark is a different quailty... have no doubts, its brilliant and clean.. one of my best buys

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product

customer_reviews.author: Janet Walker

customer_reviews.title: Does what we expected!

customer_reviews.title: Great value

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for cleaning the floors

product_meta.title: Shark S6005UK Cleaner Steam Mop, 1050 W, Grey & White
product_meta.description:
Steam clean floors and more: enjoy the confidence of a chemical-free clean throughout your home with this shark steam mop. Easily go from floors to surfaces. Lift away to transform into a handheld steam cleaner for precise above-the-floor cleaning. Clean and sanitise 99.9% Of common household bacteria using no harsh chemicals, just the power of steam. 

Go handheld with lift-away: simply lift away the main unit from the mop head to convert into a handheld steam cleaner. Attach one of the five accessories to clean all sealed surfaces with confidence and precision – from bathroom tiles, taps and shower screens to windows, kitchen worktops and inside the oven. Corners, edges and crevices are all within easy reach.

For all hard floors: purposefully designed for use on all sealed hard floors, including tile, stone and hardwood. At the touch of a button, switch between 2 automatic steam settings for a targeted deep clean – high to tackle high-traffic areas and low for light, everyday dirt. 

Double-sided cleaning power: clean double the floor area with klik ‘n’ flip technology. Simply slide the floorhead into the machine-washable, reusable dirt grip cleaning pad and click to secure. Flip to clean double the floor area, then enjoy touch-free pad removal with a simple flick of a switch. 

Steam blaster: stubborn mess? No problem. Steam blaster mode targets dirt with a direct blast of steam, easily lifting stuck-on dirt. Simply flip the head back to wipe away. 

Chemical-free cleaning: ideal for homes with children and pets. 500Ml capacity water tank. 30-Second heat-up time. Standby mode pauses the steam. Free 2-year guarantee upon registration with shark, for your peace of mind. 

Sanitisation studies were conducted under controlled test conditions. Household conditions and results may vary. Klik n’ flip mop head only when used with steam mop on high setting. Not in steam blaster mode. See instruction booklet for instructions.

Cleans and sanitises 99.9% of common household bacteria
Easily clean all sealed hard floors and surfaces: hardwood, tiles, glass, worktops, ovens and more
Touch-free, double-sided cleaning power with Klik 'n’ Flip Technology. Steam Blaster mode for stubborn dirt
Includes 5 accessories and 2 machine-washable Dirt Grip cleaning pads
